c74object.name: abc.hoa.optim~

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: first argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

attribute.name: optimtype
attribute.description:
sets the optimization type [init=0:min=0:max=2:step=1].
If 2, inPhase optimization is used when the audience covers all the circle
If 1, maxRe optimization is used when the audience is confined to the center of the circle
If 0, basic has no effect
